body.description: PRODUCT OVERVIEWClean, elegant design - thin and light, starting at just 2.76 pounds, Surface Laptop 2 fits easily in your bag. Choose from rich tone-on-tone color combinations: Platinum, Burgundy, and Cobalt Blue. Improved speed and performance to do what you want, with the latest 8th Generation Intel Core processor. All-day battery life, with up to 14.5 hours of video playback. Vibrant 13.5" PixelSense Display with interactive touchscreen and razor-sharp resolution. The Windows you know - comes with Windows 10 Home.KEY FEATURESClean, elegant design thin and light, starting at just 2.76 pounds, Surface Laptop 2 fits easily in your bagChoose from rich tone on tone color combinations: Platinum, Burgundy, and Cobalt BlueImproved speed and performance to do what you want, with the latest 8th Generation Intel Core processorAll-day battery life, with up to 14.5 hours of video playback. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect affordable laptop for college students
reviews.reviewText: This laptop is *almost* perfect. The ONLY thing I dislike is the Alcantara material around the keyboard and trackpad. I haven't had this happen yet, but I've seen photos of more well used laptops having spots of wear, dirt, and sweat on the material. They sell products to cover the material, but I think it was just a bad design choice and a general oversight.The performance is exactly what you would expect for a laptop from this year and with these specs. It preforms office tasks and basic browsing with flying colors. I don't see this laptop doing well for anyone who runs more demanding programs like the adobe suite or blender for example. But for what you pay for, this laptop does beautifully. The screen quality is excellent, touch screen is responsive, laptop holds charge for quite some time and charges pretty dang fast.I absolutely LOVE how thin this thing is. I've owned many laptops in the past and this thing blows my previous MacBook Air out of the water on it's portability and weight.Overall, 100% worth your money if you're looking for something affordable, functional, and sleek.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got for my mom after she bought a chromebook and was very frustrated by it
reviews.reviewText: "I love this computer, thank you for helping me figure out what I needed"She didn't need a ton of power, she's just doing emails and web browsing and shopping. The quality of these are way above most laptops, certainly in this price range now. She absolutely loves it.Microsoft puts a lot of effort into making these mac competitors and the quality is genuinely impressive and I don't have to learn apple nonsense or try to help my 74 year old mom figure out a completely new system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great deal, I received it earlier than the shipping date and it's like brand new. I would never know that this has been refurbished.The device itself is great, not powerful enough for gaming so if that's what you're looking for , this isnt it. But for getting work done and web surfing as well as other functions this laptop is great for it. I bought it for college as a freshman and I am sure I wont regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars STOPS HOLDING CHARGE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in January. The laptop LOOKED GOOD BUT AFTER 2 weeks it stopped holding a charge. I was in the middle of a final, and it just wouldn't charge. Thats the problem…. These reviews aren’t updated…. Because at first i fell in love and made a good review but this laptop stopped working quickly. Please buy feom another site try Backmarket…. Or another place… amazon refurbishing has been letting me down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for a refurbished laptop
reviews.reviewText: Ordered and this arrived within 4 days. Laptop is basically brand new so overall I'm impressed. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there is a very small tad bit of wear on the edge on the keyboard. No one would ever notice unless you tried hard to look at it.Spec's were as advertised (8GB RAM, 256 SSD, i5). Screen quality is amazing, Glossy and clean. Keyboard is in brand new condition.I will say I am impressed with how they packaged the product, knowing it's a refurbished device. It came in an authentic Microsoft box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great product!
reviews.reviewText: I, like so many other on here, had some reservations about going with a refurbished laptop. I decided to try this one out, as the dealer had a lot of surprisingly good reviews. I’m sure glad I did! The computer came in original box, and the machine itself looks brand new; no dings, scratches, or chips and it was clean as a whistle. The start-up was quick and streamlined and so far the item functions perfectly. Only drawback was that I thought the surface laptop 2 had a removable screen and it appears I was incorrect. That was a research error on my part however. Digital drawing programs still appear to work great and the surface pen operates flawlessly with this laptop. I’m really looking forward to using this laptop for school and art!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like it
reviews.reviewText: Very good screen, as in, VERY good. Quick, keyboard fantastic as is touchscreen. only add on to buy, if you're a numbers geek like me, is a blue tooth 10key (about $14.00) and mini hub extension ($8.00). Then you'll have four USB ports and a fully functional expanded keyboard. Super good computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great personal use computer
reviews.reviewText: Love how nicely it syncs up with my android/Google products. It's fast, light, and a good battery life. I am not an expert on laptops, but needed something reliable that I could stream movies on, and have good video for long distance chats. Love the metal, and I got a plastic sticky cover because I was worried my hands would stain the fabric. So far, it's performed excellent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es fácil las compras por este medio
reviews.reviewText: Satisfecho con el producto lo vamos empezar a manejar

reviews.reviewTitle: Tiempo perdido en esas compras re acondicionadas !!!!
reviews.reviewText: No sirve prácticamente no se podía cargar la batería, decepción en realidades una verdadera lastima que el mismo Amazon te diga que fue verificado por sus técnicos, jamás comprar ese tipo de productos. Te lo ofrecen como ganga y caí en el engaño, es la única mala experiencia que he tenido con esta compañía, es por eso que caí en exceso de confianza, ojalá resuelvan pronto lo del rembolso !!!
